code: import Button from'@mui/material/Button';import TextField from'@mui/material/TextField';import Text from'@mui/material/Typography';import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=_ref=>{let{onNext}=_ref;const[inputName,setInputName]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleStartGame=()=>{onNext(inputName);if(inputName===""){alert("Please enter your name");return;}navigate('/game');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Welcome to Life of Corg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"begin-game",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{children:"Please Enter the Name You woul like to be given"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Name",onChange:e=>setInputName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",onClick:handleStartGame,children:"Begin The Game"})]})]});};export default Home;
